name: Tappy (Pre Prototype Build)
description:
Note: This is EXTREMELY UNFINISHED! It is just a test to make sure everything works. A true prototype will be coming soon.

Uh oh, pattios! You (tappy) have been captured by Sir McDoom! In order to escape, you must engage in endless rythm games!

Instructions - When a ball comes up, left click to shoot it.
